commit.message:
Perform mixed collections

Upon completion of old-gen concurrent marking, select certain old-gen regions to be
evacuated and other old-gen regions to be coalesced and filled.  Use concurrent threads
to coalesce and fill the relevant old-gen regions.  Then schedule the other old-gen
regions to be evacuated during subsequent young-gen evacuation passes.  Use garbage
first heuristics to prioritize old-gen collection regions and limit the amount of old-gen
data that needs to be evacuated during each young-gen evacuation so as to minimize
impact on young-gen evacuation cadence.  A new jtreg test case exercises mixed collections.

cr https://code.amazon.com/reviews/CR-47908455
